content:
<rule id="security-02200" xmlns="http://windup.jboss.org/schema/jboss-ruleset">
            <when>
                <file filename="{*}xmlsec{*}.jar"/>
            </when>
            <perform>
                <classification category-id="information" effort="0" title="Embedded library - Apache Santuario">
                    <description>The application embeds a Apache Santuario library.</description>
                </classification>
                <technology-tag level="INFORMATIONAL">Apache Santuario</technology-tag>
            </perform>
        </rule>
